name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior AWS Engineer with over 10 years of experience specializing in **AWS**, **Infrastructure-as-Code**, and **Cloud Consulting**. Expertise in designing and delivering robust cloud-native architectures, with a strong focus on **SAP on AWS Migration Acceleration Program** and **AWS Well-Architected Framework**. Proficient in implementing **Terraform** and **CDK** for infrastructure management, ensuring high availability and disaster recovery solutions. Skilled in optimizing **AWS Network**, **AWS IAM**, and **AWS Storage** to support mission-critical applications. Proven communicator with a customer-oriented mindset and demonstrated ability to lead effective team collaboration in fast-paced environments, contributing to impactful projects for organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
